text: Noah is a Biblical epic movie. It is directed by Darren Aronofsky and written by Aronofsky and Ari Handel. It stars Russell Crowe, Anthony Hopkins, Emma Watson, Jennifer Connelly, Douglas Booth, Logan Lerman, and Ray Winstone. The movie is based on the story of Noah's Ark. The movie was released in North American cinemas on March 28, 2014. ==References== Category:2014 drama movies Category:Epic movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Darren Aronofsky
title: Noah (movie)
